daily_tasks.title: Review code changes
daily_tasks.description: Review the latest pull requests and provide feedback.

daily_tasks.title: Update project documentation
daily_tasks.description: Ensure all recent changes are reflected in the project documentation.

daily_tasks.title: Attend team meeting
daily_tasks.description: Participate in the weekly team sync-up to discuss project progress.

daily_tasks.title: Test new features
daily_tasks.description: Run tests on the newly implemented features to ensure functionality.

daily_tasks.title: Plan next sprint
daily_tasks.description: Outline tasks and goals for the upcoming sprint based on current progress.
